abstract: An advocacy group says it has documents suggesting that Cisco Systems tailored its technology to help China in apprehending members of Falun Gong.
snippet: An advocacy group says it has documents suggesting that Cisco Systems tailored its technology to help China in apprehending members of Falun Gong.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — An advocacy group that accuses Cisco Systems of aiding the Chinese government in monitoring and apprehending members of the banned Falun Gong organization said Friday that it had new evidence to suggest that Cisco specifically tailored its technology for that purpose.

headline.main: Group Says It Has New Evidence of Cisco’s Misdeeds in China
headline.print_headline: New Evidence Is Claimed in Lawsuit Against Cisco

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
